definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

pinyin: zhuan1 yong4 ji2 cheng2 dian4 lu4
xu1 ni3 zhuan1 yong4 wang3 luo4

sentences.english: The die contacting press is the special equipment of automobile die.
sentences.chinese: 模具研配液压机是研配汽车模具的专用设备。

sentences.english: Capable of strictly abiding by the stipulations on the printing of invoices and the production and management of special products for anti-fake invoices.
sentences.chinese: 能严格遵守发票印制和发票防伪专用品生产管理规定。

sentences.english: The products made from the two appropriative resins show excellent comprehensive performance.
sentences.chinese: 由该专用树脂制得的制品具有优良的综合性能。

sentences.english: Booksewing needle for the MARTINI, ASTER sewing machine.
sentences.chinese: 马天尼阿斯达锁线机专用针。

sentences.english: I want to apply for carving a special invoice stamp.
sentences.chinese: 我要申请雕刻发票专用章。

sentences.english: The athlete is checked by their physio or doctor.
sentences.chinese: 由专用理疗师或医生为运动员做检查。

sentences.english: Easton suggested that a special saloon carriage should be engaged.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯顿建议雇一辆专用客车。

sentences.english: In the spirit of gender-equality, a male-only carriage must be introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本着男女平等的精神，必须设立男士专用车厢。

sentences.english: The tie-back assembly is a special cementing tool for tieback operation.
sentences.chinese: 与回接筒配套用于回接尾管的一种专用固井工具。

sentences.english: They pried military information out of a prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 雷达情报网是一种专用的军事情报网。

sentences.english: Clean ballast tanks are dedicated to ballasting operations and their contents are not mixed with fuel or oil.
sentences.chinese: 意思就是不装燃油或者原油的专用压在舱。

sentences.english: The utility model fills the blank of the special tank car for transporting the bulk dry-mixed mortar in China.
sentences.chinese: 填补了国内干混砂浆无散装运输专用罐车的空白。

sentences.english: For $3, you can afford to buy a single-purpose shirt.
sentences.chinese: 而3美元，你有能力买来作为一件专用的衬衫。

sentences.english: The first letter of a proper noun must be capitalized.
sentences.chinese: 专用名词的第一个字母必须大写。

sentences.english: According to the market demand and development of production of special boneless wiper.
sentences.chinese: 并且根据市场需求研发生产多种车型的专用无骨雨刮。

sentences.english: A special medical device for the treatment of congenital megacolon is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计一种用于治疗先天性巨结肠的专用医疗器材。

definition: to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to belong or be dedicated exclusively to/proprietary/private/personal
to use anywhere, anytime (card, ticket etc)/to be used by everyone (language, textbook etc)/(of two or more things) interchangeable
to use for the purpose of/to serve as
